item.title: Vortex: A Load-Balancing in C++ using IO_URING, Introduction
item.description:
Introduction #

Vortex is a learning-focused project that explores Linux Networking and Concurrency in C++. The goal of the project is to build a proficient load-balancing web server to understand the complexities of networking at the OS level.

In this posts series, Iâ€™ll walk you through the architecture of Vortex, how it handles load balancing, and some of the key challenges I faced while implementing the solution in C++ and Linux Networking.
